name: Mohammad Sadoghi
content: Sadoghi, Mohammad – Computer Science Sadoghi, Mohammad Associate Professor Mohammad Sadoghi Department of Computer Science 2063 Kemper Hall, Room 3055 University of California Davis, CA 95616 Email: msadoghi@ucdavis.edu Website: Exploratory Systems Lab Research Professor Sadoghi‘s research spans all facets of secure and massive-scale data management. He leads the ExpoLab Research Group with the aim to pioneer a resilient data platform at scale, a distributed ledger centered around a democratic and decentralized computational model (Blockchain Textbook, Consensus Textbook, Apache ResilientDB (Incubating), Journey, Outlook/Slides, Talk/Slides, Bitcoin Radio, Code, Hands-on, Wiki) that further aims to unify secure transactional and real-time analytical processing (Transaction Textbook, L-Store, QueCC). We envision ResilientDB to serve as a platform to foster “creativity”.  He has co-founded a blockchain company called Moka Blox, a spin-off of our ResilientDB Fabric. Comments are closed. Associate Professor Mohammad Sadoghi Computer Science University of California Davis, CA 95616
